Description: Marble fuenrary stela of the meizoteros Paulos; 14 lines of Coptic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Hall, Coptic and Greek Texts (1905): 11, pl. X.4 J. van der Vliet, The Journal of Juristic Papyrology 32 (2002), pp. 185-191, pl. facing p. 186.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.11, Pl.10)
Junker 1925 / Die christlischen Grabsteine Nubiens (p.122, no.5, p.140) (p.130, note4)
van der Vliet 2002 / Gleanings from Christian Northern Nubia (no. 3, 185-91)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 10:4 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
